function.name: get_eef_pos
function.description: Get the current end effector position of the robot in its own frame in the scheme [x,y,z] in meters

function.name: get_eef_rot
function.description: Get the current end effector rotation of the robot in its own frame as an euler rotation in the scheme [x,y,z]

function.name: resolve_object_from_name
function.description: Get the current position of a simulated object 'pos' and rotation 'rot' as a dict

object_name.description: The name of the object to resolve

function.name: open_gripper
function.description: Opens the gripper of the robot

function.name: close_gripper
function.description: Closes the gripper of the robot and continues to apply force even after closing

function.name: move_abs
function.description: Moves to the specified absolute position relative to the robot frame. Returns false if it thinks that it's stuck and true otherwise

x.description: The x coordinate of the position to move to in meters

y.description: The y coordinate of the position to move to in meters

z.description: The z coordinate of the position to move to in meters

function.name: grip_object
function.description: Opens the gripper, moves the gripper to the object with the given name, then closes the gripper. The movement always follows a straight line and does not evade hindrances. Returns false if any of the movements seemed stuck at some point in time, true otherwise

object_name.description: The name of the object to be picked

function.name: grip_object_from_above
function.description: Opens the gripper, moves the gripper above the object with the given name, then to the object with the given name, then closes the gripper. Returns false if any of the movements seemed stuck at some point in time, true otherwise

object_name.description: The name of the object to be picked

function.name: press_button
function.description: Presses the button of the microwave. Returns false if any of the movements seemed stuck at some point in time, true otherwise

function.name: open_door
function.description: Opens the door of the microwave. Returns false if any of the movements seemed stuck at some point in time, true otherwise

function.name: close_door
function.description: Closes the door of the microwave. Returns false if any of the movements seemed stuck at some point in time, true otherwise

function.name: place_object_at_destination
function.description: Opens the gripper and drops the object on ground, optionally at destination

object_name.description: The name of the object to be placed

destination_name.description: The name of the destination where the object should placed

height_offset.description: The height offset from where to drop the object above the destination in meters

front_offset.description: The offset in the x direction from where to drop the object before/after the destination in meters

function.name: approach_destination_from_direction
function.description: Move along every axis except for the given direction, then fully move to destination. Uses coordinates relative to the robot frame. Returns false if any of the movements seemed stuck at some point in time, true otherwise

destination.description: The coordinates of the destination in the format [x, y, z] in meters

direction.description: The direction in which to move last

function.name: put_down_object_at_current_pos
function.description: Opens the gripper and places the object on the ground at the current position

object_name.description: The name of the object to be put down

function.name: check_gripping_object
function.description: Checks if the gripper distance is too small to hold an object and the object therefore isn't gripped anymore, then returns true if the object still seems to be there and false otherwise
